headline: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway Bought This Stock as 2024 Wound Down
summary: Berkshire Hathaway bought up more  VeriSign  shares as the final days of 2024 ticked away.  The purchases were made through  Berkshire Hathaway  insurance unit Geico, which now owns 7,996,889 VeriSign shares, according to a form Berkshire filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission.  Berkshire Hathaway now has total ownership of 13,269,836 VeriSign shares when including stock owned by the pension plans of other units.
